Reviews.Title: “bad stay”
Reviews.Author: 420rogersj
Reviews.Content: the rooms are not cleaned well, the internet worked out side the room.. the room came with a meal , all there was there was bread.. and coffee.. not good at all. when I talked to the front desk, they could care less about the room or bread. I was told if I did not like it, do not come back.. well that is the only thing I was told that was good..

Reviews.Title: “Believe the reviews!”
Reviews.Author: GVLsandlapper
Reviews.Content: I too thought the reviews were just being exaggerated. I've stayed in dive hotels at the beach before, but I've never stayed somewhere like this. Our room was absolutely awful. Holes in the wall, stained mattresses, holes in the carpet, a balcony door that literally had to be lifted just to open. The fridge which leaked cold air so nothing ever got cold, and the oven and microwave which looked like the first models ever invented. We saw roaches multiple times, and not to mention the mold that is prevalent throughout the building. I could go on and on but I think you get the idea. Do yourself a favor, DON'T STAY HERE.

Reviews.Title: “terrible not the word”
Reviews.Author: meme2454
Reviews.Content: sticks Roaches filth place needs to be shut down and ower should be fined

Reviews.Title: “dont gooooo”
Reviews.Author: sherry p
Reviews.Content: this hotel is nothing like the pictures. my self and husband got stuck in the elevator the first day and they would work sometimes. We had to use the stairs and it was nasty and smelled like urine.pool dirty, rooms smelled , holes in wall and ceiling. no customer services at all. They hung up on you when called the desk. we checked out day 2 along with other people.the sliding doors in the room you could hardley open them , my husband even had a hard time. just want everyone to know do not go there,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, TERRABLE,

Reviews.Title: “Believe It!”
Reviews.Author: April S
Reviews.Content: When In read all the bad reviews, I thought that there was NO WAY it could be that bad, it is! Staff was extremely rude, the elevator is so bad and CRACKED that ,y fa,ily almost fell through. It takes you to the wrong floor etc. The hallways are muggy and full of mold. The room is falling apart and the shwr didnt work. I told attendant where he rolled his eyes at me and told me he was SURE it did. Didn't offer me a new room or anything!' Absolutely horrible. I went down the road, stayed for $15 cheaper, the room wasnt fancy but it was CLEAN, the manager was polite, and it was worth the money. NEVER AGAIN. This place needs to be SHUT DOWN July 1st

Reviews.Title: “Gross!!”
Reviews.Author: mandy l
Reviews.Content: Came to Ocean Sands for a 3 night stay with two college girlfriends for a short vacation. I would NOT recommend this hotel for anyone, but families especially should beware. The floors were moldy, dirty and constantly wet (even the carpets in the rooms.) There is no way I would let my small children crawl or walk on these floors. The interior of the hotel appears to have suffered extensive water damage, that has never been repaired. The walls in our room were stained, and their were large stickers on several surfaces. There was a hole in the bathroom door that, instead of being patched, simply had duct tape over it. The bathroom towels showed considerable signs of wear. The bathtub did not seem to be sufficiently supported from below. The shower itself took a remarkable amount of strength to turn on, I'm sure they were never upgraded. The mildewy shower curtain only had one sheet, which stuck to your body as you bathed, making it difficult to feel clean. The beds were also a disapointment, I found a short and curly hair on my pillow. The mattresses and sheets have likely never been replaced. Furthermore, there was not a clock radio in the room. While there was a TV, there was quite a bit of signal interference, so watching it was difficult. The dresser drawers, which we hoped to unpack our suitcases into, were filthy , covered in dust and hair. Perhaps the most alarming aspect of our stay was the discovery that the door connecting our room and the adjacent room was unlockable. We found a piece of duct tape that was meant to keep the door from being opened, which was hanging limply off the door frame. It is infuriating that we were not warned about this, as we had valuables in the room, as well as concern for our own safety. We ended up having to drag the table in front of the door. The deadbolt to the front door of our room was faulty as well. The elevators are to be avoided if possible. A fellow visitor informed me that her mother got stuck in the left elevator for 25 minutes earlier in their stay. The buttons to call for the elevator didn't work, and neither did the floor number lights inside. The outdoor pool had soda cans, trash, and dirt in it, athough it had been cleaned by the 3rd day.The front lobby area had no AC, and the doors into the lobby could only be opened by pulling the heavy "automatic" doors apart by their handles. The cleaning ladies were all very friendly, as was MOST of the frontdesk staff. The fire alarm pull looked damaged beyond repair, as if the plastic had been melted somehow. All in all, my frustrations with this place would not be so numerous had the place been sanitary. I can handle old, dated hotels for a cheap price, but dirty is never acceptable. I'll never stay here again, definetly not worth the cheaper rates.

Reviews.Title: “Negative”
Reviews.Author: MandS0923
Reviews.Content: This place was so bad, I don't know where to begin. The outside awning was torn in areas, the building needs a complete exterior wash and paint, and the automatic front doors did not work. You had to open and close them yourself. The first front desk clerk we dealt with was rude. The hallways were smelly and the elevator semi worked. We used the stairs not only because it was faster, but slightly safer. The concrete stairs smelled like urine with holes and divots. The carpets were old, dirty, and smelly. I advise wearing shoes when going through the indoor pool desk due to the decay of the rocks. We did not use the outdoor pool but the lounge chairs were sufficient. The outside pool deck was dirty and could use a good pressure cleaning. The room itself had a hint of Febreeze to cover the moldy odor. Shotty patch jobs from the holes in the walls and doors. There were petrified boogers on the walls. The room and hotel in general had a roach issue. The bathroom faucet only worked when turned on all the way and the shower needed 'elbow grease' to work. The tv only had 7 channels in which 2 of them were fuzzy w/ rolling screens and the remote was broken. No microwave, phone, wi-fi, or fitted bed sheet. One lamp and one outlet worked throughout the entire room. The fridge was old and rusty and made a lot of noise. The fold-out couch was nasty and stained with a large hole in it. The sliding glass door opened partially and needed force to get it open that much. The outside AC unit's grill had fallen off to expose the rust and decomposition of the eqipment. A low-grade tropical storm came through on our last night. This was the WORST of the entire experience: we were the only tenants on the 3rd floor (we found this out afterwards). I started to hear a strange fast beeping sound which I thought was part of the movie we were watching and 20 minutes after the movie was over, it still beeped. I opened my room door and went down the hall and it stopped. When I went back to my room, it started again. My husband did the same thing. We both went downstairs to say something and she told us that no alarms were flashing from her area. We went back up to the room and it happened again. There was also eerie banging and howling in the hallways. Needless to say, we packed up within 2 minutes and checked out immediately. Due to the storm, we had to stay at another hotel. It was the absolute WORST hotel I have ever stayed. The only positive thing I have to say is that the housekeeping staff was pleasant and the towels smelled like coconuts. I have had some poor experiences at other hotels but none to this length. I do not recommend this place at all!! Please just pay the extra $20/night and get yourself a decent place to stay. Otherwise, it's a good dump for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoy awesome oceanfront views at discounted rates while it lasts!!!”
Reviews.Author: Fl0rida_Beach_L0ver
Reviews.Content: Despite all the hotel review "horror stories" about the condition of the hotel, I spent a very pleasurable 3 days in it with my wife. Yes, the hotel is old, yes it needs lots of maintenance but... where else in Daytona Beach would you get such a superb view from a beachfront room with balcony for $45 a night?? Hotel attendants told us the place is about to close in order to undergo a total renovation and become a Hampton Inn, so if you want to enjoy those rates they offer, do it now!

Reviews.Title: “Basic, but great for the price.”
Reviews.Author: MarisaMon
Reviews.Content: My friend and I just got back from a stay here. When we got into the hotel we realized that it was as dirty and run down as the other reviews state. We were able to check in at 1pm instead of the listed check in time of 4pm. The front desk women were all very rude. When we asked for towels, soap, etc. we were always satisfied with what they gave us. The hotel is located directly on the beach. The outdoor and indoor pool were both very dirty. Our room was clean but broken down. There were some holes in the wall, cracks in the tile, the back door didn't open well, and there was a few stains on the mattress. But honestly, it was worth the price. We found a movie theater and ocean shops about a mile down the road. We had a great time. If you're just looking for a basic room, this is for you.

Reviews.Title: “Wish I never booked this...”
Reviews.Author: Bobbyaisss
Reviews.Content: This place...to be nice...it's not very good...to be true...it's a dump....now I changed to another brand name hotel and writing this review... I go to daytona every week and stay on the beach...this week just forgot to book room then I found this ocean sands online for 59 dollars...which sounds good, and king size room...ok, so I booked it... The night I checked in, there was an old man there, we have no idea what does he do there, then later a black girl came out checked us in--never said anything like how are u or have a good night...if u think that's not necessary...then continue read. The elevator doesn't work good, and it's sooooo old...feel like u are in a scary movie, then we got to our floor, there was nothing to cover the windows, the bugs and wind blow in and feel like I was in grave yard. No free wifi...unless u r bright house network user. Paid 3 hrs for 4 dollars I opened the door to the room...the light didnt work, then, when I look at the place, it was a nightmare, it's the room u see in scary movie--huge noisy fridge, old desk with people writting on that--from 2001!...on the wall, there is a name and 03, god I felt like someone dead there. The curtains cannot be closed well, the remote control doesn't work, a dead roach under the sink, the fan in the bathroom was under there too! There was a hole on the ceiling where the fan was, and more, u can tell that someone broke in the room before since the door frame was glued together!! The lights near the bed was no even plugged in, and the thing made me so scared was the phone was not even working--actually there was no button left on it!!! Can anyone stay at a place like that...??? Besides, when I walked in the door, I started to cough and sneeze, the mold smell was gross... There is nothing I recommend for this place, even the price--not for 44usd for that dump. I didn't know that was only 44, since Expedia told me it was 60. The funny thing was that when we decided to leave after 10mins in the room, we gave back the key to the guy--not the same girl checked us in--in front desk, and we said we cannot stay here. He didn't even ask why, he just replied "yes" then that was all it... I guess it's normal that people checked out right after they checked in? So, if u want an adventure, go there experience the ghost room, see how u like it. I wil never go back. Sorry. But that is not a way to do a business.

Reviews.Title: “stayed for 2 days”
Reviews.Author: 420rogersj
Reviews.Content: the room had hair in the bathroom,, and on the beds,, the pool out side was not working.. I felf like I should have paid 25 a night, make sure you look first,, pics are not right,, it might been that way when it first opened.. why do they not take up to date pics.. for no one would stay.. But there will be few that pay first and can not get anything back,, I wish I could do my retail business sell something that is not right and say O)OOOO so sorry and that is all you would get.. by the way if you have time check us out.. thesecretsofthedeadsea.com. or call it is on the web site.. thanks and god bless, hope you have a nice time

Reviews.Title: “For God's sake...”
Reviews.Author: Thea L
Reviews.Content: DON'T GO HERE! This hotel is really great if you are a junkie who just doesn't give a damn what the condition of the hotel is. First off, when you enter the hotel the aroma of the building hits you in the face. It clearly smells like mold. The elevator looks like you are either going to get raped or murdered, or that it will break down while you are in it. Second off, the rooms are deplorable. The sheets felt like someone had slept on them for weeks without washing, and the mattress had blood stains on it. This wasn't menstrual blood, folks. It was legitimate blood splatters. I could continue to complain even further but I will end it as a big, bold: DO NOT EVER WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS HOTEL!

Reviews.Title: “Glad we looked first!”
Reviews.Author: dhmom247
Reviews.Content: After looking at website this hotel looked nice and price was good. But, because price was so good we were suspicious so decided to take a look before making reservations for our anniversary. We asked receptionist if we could look around, lobby was tacky and dirty, small pool inside and out. Lobby restroom had no lock on door and paper products were just sitting on counter, no soap. We left after 15 minutes receptionist didn't even look up when we walked back through. The 2 hour road trip to check out first, was well worth the trip! Health inspector should probably take a look at this place.

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: Walton766
Reviews.Content: We stayed in July 2011 and hoping to be staying again this coming July. We realy enjoyed being right on the beach in our osean-side room. Was clean and the peaple where very nice. Good loction too. It is an older hotel and it showed a bit in places, but we had no falt or complants. We where very happy staying here and plan to return again this year. We had a Great stay at "The Osean Sands" Love Daytona. Gene + Rhonda. Silex, Missouri. Lots of photos from our july 2011 and our Feb 2012 (wish we had stayed at Osean Sands in Feb) trips on my face book acount for anyone to see. RhondaFayWalton@yahoo.com Daytona Beach Florida is the Best place I have ever traveled to and this hotel is a great place to stay while you visit there.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: DaytonaB
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Ocean Sands and were very pleased with our experience. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The new manager Steve was able to turn this place from a dump into a very clean and comfortable hotel in a matter of a couple of days. It was absolutely amazing. The hotel is old and dated but for the price and the service, it is unmatched. I would certainly recommend the Ocean Sands to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Ocean Front Room at a bargain price.”
Reviews.Author: catt834
Reviews.Content: Some cosmetic changes need to be made, however this is an oceanfront room at a bargain price. The staff is wonderful, very accommodating. While the furniture & carpeting are old, everything is very clean. There is plenty of hot water & really good shower heads. The sheets and towels are a reasonable quality. It seemed to have a lot of couples as guests and is very quiet. Oceanfront pool is kept very clean with plenty of lounges. We enjoyed our stay so much we are extending another 3 days.

Reviews.Title: “new management and new ownership!!!! huge improvement”
Reviews.Author: coolitman
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel a year ago and must say I would have agreed with the previous reviews..... I recently found out that it was under new ownership and decided I would try it again... hard to beat for the price on the beach anywhere.... so we loaded up our truck and gave it another go.... well I was very much astonished at the friendliness of the staff and the professionalism... I think it's heading in a positive direction and Steve is a great Hotel Manager... I am aware that yes it is outdated but the clientel is much better and well honestly it's much cleaner I didn't see any bugs on my stay.... and well miracles can't happen overnight they are trying.. the hotel is going to be redone I heard soon so that will make it one of the best places to stay at in Daytona... and if you ask me for the money it already is for my family......

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: laloo102
Reviews.Content: At first glance, this place is very run down and poorly maintained. The staff was very friendly, they even got our room ready early and let us park to use the beach before our check in time. The room is very outdated. The beds both have craters in them from being so worn out, and the comforters are questionable. The kitchen and bathroom were thoroughly cleaned with bleach though which was nice. There is night time security that patrols all evening, so we felt safer. It is definitely a cheap place to stay, so serves its purpose if you just need a place to shower and crash. Not recommend for a family vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Waste of money....dont stay here!!!”
Reviews.Author: Janet R
Reviews.Content: Horrible hotel to stay in!! the card key system doesnt work - just push on the door it will open!!! . Fights in the hallway, the carpet was black in spots from the filth.. Cock Roaches in the kitchen and crawling on the walls , huge holes in the walls, a tiny snowy tv, that didnt work . a sliding door that didnt lock, grease build up on the cabinets and walls...dont even look at the bedding and mattress - green and black mold on the patio and in the bathroom -- worst place i ve ever seen - and i booked thru hotels.com and no refund was given!!!

Reviews.Title: “Really? REALLLLLYYYY?”
Reviews.Author: greg h
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 3 nites during bikeweek. was locked out of my room 7 times because of a bad card key system. Roaches in the bathroom, holes in the walls, a bad tv. a sliding door that didnt work. rusted appliances and bathroom toilet paper holder. I asked the front desk person how this place was still open and he laughed and said "Hell if i know". Travelocity had already taken my money up front so i was stuck! If you want to stay at a place that reminds you of the reality show "Hoarders" this is your spot! where is alchida when you need them?

Reviews.Title: “Pleasently Surprised”
Reviews.Author: Kberthiaume
Reviews.Content: I just stayed the night at this hotel after reading all of the terrible reviews, but they have new ownership and they have cleaned it up pretty good while still keeping it the most affordable hotel on the beach. All of the rooms face the ocean and they have private balconies. I will definitely be back again.

Reviews.Title: “BIGGEST MISTAKE EVER”
Reviews.Author: VISITOR S
Reviews.Content: Run down, dirty rooms, mold on walls, holes in walls, and to top it all off ROACHES IN ROOMS! This will be your biggest mistake EVER!!!! STAY AWAY FROM HERE! Ocean Sands hotel is a real crap hole

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for and the service is great and the rooms are that bad”
Reviews.Author: NavigatorChick
Reviews.Content: We stayed there last Bike Week. The Jamaican Housekeeper and her assistant, the Front Desk Clerk Kate and the Manager were more friendly than most places I've stayed for a much higher price. At least everyone spoke English and yes it could have been cleaner so I asked them for some cleaner and rags and they were happy to give them to me. We weren't paying top dollar and I clean my own house so I tidied up the place a little. I also asked for some better cooking utensils and yes, they brought them to me without an attitude but with a smile. It's very close to Main Street and a cab is only $5 per person. It is right on the beach with a pool. The manager always had rags so we could wipe our bikes down in the morning. Everyone was always smiling and eager to get you what ever you needed. I NEVER SAW A ROACH IN THE PLACE!!!! WE DIDN'T HAVE BED BUGS EITHER!!! That is what would gross me out so I could over look the other things. We had plenty of hot water for our showers. We wore flip flops in the room so the carpet wasn't a issue. Your not paying to look at the lush landscaping and it wasn't that bad either. It is very conveinant to the shopping center for groceries, the package store and some very nice restaurants too. We are renting the penthouse next year and it has a great big kitchen, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, pullout sofa, two balconies, one partial ocean view off the master bedroom and the long one in front of the living room is oceanfront, dining area and a second living room area. We camped out for years and believe me this is definitely better than that! Your not paying top dollar to stay there and your not going to get plush accommodations but for a place to crash, cook a little and take a shower it's not that bad really. If you want top of the line accommodations then PAY FOR IT!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible! Dirty! Old! Not worth a penny!”
Reviews.Author: SmartyTraveler
Reviews.Content: Horrible. Bugs. Dirty. Old. Mold. Smells terrible. Pools are gross. Regret 100% staying here. Rather have slept on a bench or the street then here! There is trash lined up in the hallways. Written notes all over hotel. My 3 yr old writes more legible. Don't stay here! U will hate it.

Reviews.Title: “DUMP...DUMP...DUMP...OMG WHAT A dump!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: disapointed4
Reviews.Content: omg...I could not believe my eyes after I pulled into the parking lot. My husband and 2 kids walked into a dump I really wished i would have read the reviews before I reserved this place online for 2 nights. Everything the reviews said is TRUE. It is nothing like the pictures they have on the internet(it looked like that when the place first opened 50yrs ago) I can't believe it even had 3 good rating they had to be on crack to rate this place good. I felt like i ruined my familys vacation because of this hotel. It definely needs to be costed down there alson was a cop outside the fist 30 mins we was there. And to top it all off there was a young girl around 19yrs old laying by the pool with her bra and thong on as soon as we walked up from the beach she got up to leave i had 2 young girls with us and hoping they did not she her i understand there are thong swim suits but ur bra and pantis. then come to find out she lives there OMG..Definetly a drug ring going on there i could not wait to get OUT...I would rather pay 100 dollars a night for a hotel..and like everyone said sleep on the beach we also put our do not disturb sign on r door...icould go on and on about this hotel...just read all the reviews and u will get the point...

Reviews.Title: “This place is a true DUMP!”
Reviews.Author: DC60BShift
Reviews.Content: The pictures on the booking sites are no where near what you see. The landscaping was horrible. Grass appeared to be uncut for weeks. The hedges and other areas were full of weeds. Part of the parking lot was unusable and had weeds growing through the concrete. The front door to the motel was broken and had to be manually slid open and closed. The office looked like someone carried boxes of paper into it and then put them in front of a fan. There was a mangy looking dog laying on the floor in the office. The front desk and lobby were horrific. No AC in the lobby and their definition of a "business center" for wireless is sitting on the couch in the lobby or placing your computer on the counter...no place to get power. Fire Doors would not shut in the stairwells. The room was for 4 people and only two towels in the room and to get more you have to ask before the maid leaves. The A/C was off in the room and the smell was horrible as was the refrigerator. The sliding door to the balcony was difficult to open even for an adult, another fire safety issue. The pools (both of them) were about 6" low on water and the sides were filthy. There were about 10 chairs by the pool and 4 of them were broken. Within two hours there about 4 police officers showed up in the parking lot to deal with some problem on one of the floors. There were several rooms on the first floor that were closed up and piled full of furniture.

Reviews.Title: “sleep in your car or out on the beach”
Reviews.Author: tjoyner
Reviews.Content: sleep in your car or out on the beach whatever you do please please please do not stay in this rat hole motel it is just horrible i should have known when we get to the Manual sliding glass door in the lobby this place was filthy from every angle the lobby was awful staff was nasty and rude no ac through the motel except in the rooms which were not much better there was some black mold in several places in the bathroom stains on the ceiling , walls ,and the floor lets not forget the 75yr old recliner that didnt work the tv didnt work we had to go to the front desk to report it , because there's no phone in the room (go figure) when the maintenance guy got to the room he appeared to be drunk and said " you hafta let the tv warm up before you can watch it" after 3hrs of " warming up" we had maybe 3 channels.. the patio door wouldn't slide more than 8" so it was practically impossible to open the door but on the plus side the view was awesome of the beach that was the ONLY good thing about the room both pools were FILTHY the outside pool had 20 or more cigarette butts in the water trash everywhere on the floor in the office every where on yeah dont forget the one elevator that worked and took FOREVER to get to the 4th floor i will NEVER NEVER NEVER go to this dump again the website really is false advertising i will also never book online with travelocity again for representing this dump

Reviews.Title: “I'd rather spend a night in jail”
Reviews.Author: otownvagabond
Reviews.Content: BE AFRAID! This was the most disgusting hotel. If you are stranded in Daytona it would be better to commit a petty crime and stay the night in jail. The website is NOT the hotel. The hotel is falling apart and filthy. It is used by prostitutes and drug dealers and I told my husband I was truly afraid to spend the night there. If you don't believe the reviews detailing the criminal activity at the hotel just call the daytona police and ask them what goes on there. The room we went into stunk of vomit and mold. There was a large hole in the wall and many places where the carpet was ripped up. There were roaches on the floor. I was afraid to touch any surface. Whoever gave this place a positive review is certifiably insane. I am not picky, love camping, love mom and pop old florida motels -but this was intolerable. We left and went to another hotel. I am 100% certain that staying in that hotel poses a risk to health and safety. I would not be surprised to find condoms, hypodermic needles, bodily fluids, or vomit in the beds. It should be condemned. Unless you are a hooker or a crack head you will not enjoy this place. BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: “Run....”
Reviews.Author: Jessica628
Reviews.Content: There are no words to describe this hotel. Upon check in, it was noticed that the front door did not work(automatic door that had to be pulled open). The corridor leading to the elevator was filthy and had holes in the wall. The room... The beds were broken and upon looking to see if the beds were clean, it was discovered someone had vomited behind the bed, down the wall and between the mattress. When the manager was informed, he wasn't surprised! We were moved to another room as it was very late and there were no other vacancies to find more deplorable conditions. Silverfish were under the mattress. Terrible is not a severe enough rating!

Reviews.Title: “DON'T EVER BOOK THIS HOTEL!!!”
Reviews.Author: BUTTERCUP0024
Reviews.Content: I DID NOT READ REVIEWS BEFORE BOOKING THIS HOTEL, AND I SHOULD HAVE!!! I made the biggest mistake EVER!!! This is the nastiest hotel in the WORLD!!! The pictures give you false advertisements. The place is a dump!!! When you drive up, the hotel looks broken down, from the rust running down the side of the walls to the sign that doesn't light up at night. When you walk through the lobby (of the slider doors that you have to slide open and close yourself) look to the left and there you will see a nasty office of some sort. There is stuff EVERYWHERE in there. The floors need new tile. There is an ancient vending machine in the lobby. There's a nasty little black dog that just sits in the lobby...the same lobby that tells us there are no dogs allowed... The front desk staff are RUDE!!! And the owner is WORSE. The air conditioning doesn't work down stairs at all. The pools are GROSS! They have like one housekeeper. They carry around clean towels (that aren't really clean...we got some towels that were still dirty with other people's hair still on them) in a trash can. The hallways smell like urine! The elevator barely works. The rooms are disgusting. The beds are hard and musty. They have sitting furniture in the rooms that needs to be thrown out! Roaches EVERYWHERE! Holes in the walls. I got sick from the mold and mildew that just sits in the walls. DON'T BOOK THIS HOTEL FOR ANY REASON!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nasty,Old,Dirty,Will leave with bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: hypa1010
Reviews.Content: We and were SUPPOSED to spend a night here.We booked it online.The pitcues looked great,but I should of listened to all the bad reviews. I was reserved for a king size eff. When I got there they said they dont have it.They then gave us a key for a room. Just the walk down the dirty,old hallway (with very little lighting) to the elevator was a bad vibe.Then getting in the elevator was even worse!! Then as soon as We opened the room door and the first thing I saw was bugs run I knew this was a NO GO. There was a sofa with two large holes in it.The beds were tiny (didnt even atempt to sit on it), the room smelled like mold,and the dresser looked like it had water damage and was falling apart. The only good thing was the view of the beach.But even the balcony felt unsafe. And the grounds of the hotel was a pool with 4 chairs,cement,and dead grass. This is a shame and should be shut down. Oh yeah the ceiling had mold on it.

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE!!!! Do NOT dismiss this review!”
Reviews.Author: tma43
Reviews.Content: WARNING: Do NOT ever stay at the Ocean Sands Hotel in Daytona! No AC in lobby or hallways, stunk like mold, elevators were rusty and rickety, pools were filthy, ceiling tile was broken, missing, peeling, or water damaged, plaster falling off hallway walls, paint peeling everywhere... in the room, AC was about to fall off wall, peeling paint and wallpaper, blood stain on bed cover!!!! I never went in it, but my wife said the bathroom looked like it hadn't been cleaned in weeks!!!!! She also saw white little bugs crawling on the carpet!!!! Needless to say we immediately made a beeline out of there as quick as we could!

Reviews.Title: “Checked in for half an hour, then left immediately.”
Reviews.Author: ihatepurdue
Reviews.Content: So very dirty. That about sums it up. There was a teenager working at the front desk when I checked in. He did not know what he was doing. When I grabbed my luggage and went down the halls, they were covered in grime and dirt. There were no lights in the hallway. The elevators were broken, so when we arrived on the fourth floor, the inside number said we were on 2. The lock on our door was broken, and when my friends and I were laying out our beach bags that we needed for the day, a maintenance man burst into our room unannounced. (What if we had been naked??). Best of all was the stench of mold coming from everywhere in the room. Everyone was instantly sneezing and coughing from the mold. It could have been coming from the dirty walls and carpet, or it could have been the fridge that had not been wiped out, or it could have been the box of dinner left in the microwave from the previous guests. We're still not sure where it came from. The first thing you see when driving up to the hotel is the landfill of garbage. Apparently they do not have trash collection. The outdoor pool had not been cleaned. It was full of grass and cigarette butts. The pathway leading to the beach was covered in broken glass. I mean it was EVERYWHERE. They have furniture randomly thrown against the window in one room that is on the first floor. It looks really classy, let me tell you. Overall, the staff was pretty nice when we told them we just couldn't stay in their filthy hotel. We were only checked in for half an hour, but they could only give us half of the money back. Everything else about the hotel was just terrible. If you don't want to die of mold poisoning, I suggest splurging an extra $20 for a decent room that is actually cleaned.

Reviews.Title: “Sleep in your car first!”
Reviews.Author: beachlover1120
Reviews.Content: We booked a room here on Priceline.com. At check-in, I realized we were in trouble, because the lobby was dirty and outdated and had a nasty coffee maker. When we got into the disgustingly dirty elevator to go up to our room, I was almost ready to find someplace else to stay, but we were there during Bike Week, and finding another place would have been difficult. The room felt very dirty - wallpaper peeling off the walls, stains on the carpet, dirty lampshades, everything just falling apart. There was a dirty old recliner in the room that probably had been there since the hotel opened, and a FULL size refrigerator with rust on the outside. The sheets on the beds were clean, but i was afraid of what lurked in the old mattress, and no way was I going to get anywhere near the bedspreads! I wore flip flops in the bathtub/shower. No hairdryer, no coffee maker, no wi-fi. The only good thing I can say about this hotel is that the towels they gave us were clean. If this was the last hotel standing, I'd sleep in my car first!

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel I have ever stayed in, dirty, nasty, actually got sick!!!!”
Reviews.Author: chastains
Reviews.Content: I don't even know where to begin... the lobby was horrific, there was no air conditioning throughout the hotel, only in the rooms, everything, and I mean everything was nasty, moldy, I actually had trouble breathing, coughed and sneezed the entire time. The sheets and comforters were nasty....tile in the room was broken the windows were filthy. There was no way I was going to get in either pool, they were actually murky looking....I left the do not disturb sign on the hotel door the whole time, there was NO WAY I was letting any of the staff in my room to touch anything. The police consistently cruised the parking lot, bums were sitting outside in front of the lobby, a nasty looking dog was in the lobby, apparently he lived there.... There was only one elevator that worked because while we were there people actually got stuck in the elevator..... everything about the hotel was horrible!!! The only good thing I could possibly muster up would be it was cheap and on the beach...however, when you are afraid to walk out of your room to get to the beach, it really doesn't matter!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “call code enforcement/building inspector”
Reviews.Author: sillysweat01
Reviews.Content: stay far away!! we have never visited such a nasty hotel in all the vacations we took to daytona.Upon our check in we paid a 50 dollar bill and they couldnt even support the change!The room they first settled us in had a crappy air condition that barely blew cold air and it was hot throughout the WHOLE hotel! they then moved us to the second room where we got settled and the fridge didnt work and the television wasnt plugging into the cable outlet.When brought to the owner/managers attention he blew it off and said,"if you expect perfect go to the hilton." Another time we walked past his office coming in from the grocery store and not only was there crap everywhere,but it stunk and his dog was in there and there was urinated newspapers in the floor as well as old food and cartons from boxes of food! Out of 2 elevators,only one worked and even then the light that says what floor youve reached said three when we were on the fourth floor! we didnt expect perfection for the deal we got but did at least expect one of the 20 different things he offered to at least work!

Reviews.Title: “Pretty Bad”
Reviews.Author: Pattyoh
Reviews.Content: We got an oceanview room at a great price during bike week but don't think I would stay here again. Very dirty and gross.

Reviews.Title: “Rude Rude Rude”
Reviews.Author: nsvacati0ner
Reviews.Content: It was the only place we could find for race week, pre paid for 3 nights...BIG MIstake.......place was filthy, microwave looked like something blew up in it. Patio doors were so dirty you could not see the ocean, there was not hot water, and when we complained were told 'there are 700 other people who want a shower you know" The inside pool was not fit, and the back stairway was full of junk a total fire hazzard. I can only say I didn't know about the crack heads that lived there that would have been the last straw. Never again and we have told everyone we know in Nova Scotia STAY AWAY

Reviews.Title: “THIS IS NOT A RESORT...IT IS A HOUSE OF PROSTITUTION & DRUG DEALING!”
Reviews.Author: brittneysbridal
Reviews.Content: If you want an honest review of this hotel and you tend to not believe the reviews you are reading here, all you need to do is call the Daytona Beach Police and ask them if they make frequent trips here. Is the place filthy....YES! Is the staff rude....ABSOLUTELY! After all, they are making their money off of the prostitutes that LIVE in the hotel and the drugs they deal out of their parking lot. As a matter of fact, that is the only reason this place is still open. After the last hurricane, it was condemned and was to be torn down. However, it is still standing (barely) and operating in full force as a filthy whore house and drug ring. DO NOT EVEN CONSIDER THIS PLACE IF YOU HAVE EVEN AN OUNCE OF PRIDE OR unless you want to take some unwelcome visitors back home with you.

Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For!!!”
Reviews.Author: KenandCarla
Reviews.Content: I guess for 45.00 a night you can't expect much. The hotel is run down and management doesn't seem to want to do any improvements. I even heard one customer telling him of some concerns and he told them to just leave instead of addressing the issues. Otherwise for a cheap weekend it;s okay.

Reviews.Title: “Fun for kids nice big pool and one heated inside”
Reviews.Author: srching4luv7
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Ocean Sands Resort and every thing worked. the microwave dings when its done and the ding is so cute! btw did i mention THE POOL IS SO COOL! My kids love to swim and were very happy with the 2 pools. The hotel is old and we made sure to use lysol when we arrived, but overall was a nice room. The day staff was EXTREMELY friendly and eager to help us with any request. The night staff however was very rude and was offended that we asked for working batteries for the TV remote control (which we never did get). The view is amazing as all their rooms are ocean front, and the price is unbeatable. I plan on staying there again this summer!

Reviews.Title: “Dump”
Reviews.Author: FloridaRescreen
Reviews.Content: Broken beer bottles on pool deck, this place is falling apart they seriously need to invest in remodeling the walls ceiling and pool deck.

Reviews.Title: “better than nothing”
Reviews.Author: rusty929
Reviews.Content: Ok so its not the Ritz..we didn't make a reservation, as going to Ocean Shores was a last minute decision AT night. They were the only place with a room available. and it Was on the Ocean side. its not the best place in the world for sure. The late night attendant was mean as a junk yard dawg to us, she was pretty rude to say the least.....She sent us over to the old side of the motel without any further comment but pointing to which way to go. However, the room was clean, though it had lots of problems..which had me alittle worried...Ok so its not the Ritz..we didn't make a reservation, as going to Ocean Shores was a last minute decision AT night. They were the only place with a room available. and it Was on the Ocean side. its not the best place in the world for sure. The late night attendant was mean as a junk yard dawg to us, she was pretty rude to say the least.....She sent us over to the old side of the motel without any further comment but pointing to which way to go. However, the room was clean, though it had lots of problems..which had me alittle worried...the outlets were shorted out, the windows weren't secure in the frame,,,,,,and wouldn't close all the way...only one light bulb worked in the bedside lamps..but the bathroom was clean....and the sheets were clean. the morning staff was very nice as I gave them a list to things wrong...especially the electric problems..She seemed rather embarrassed..but was courteous. If you want a great room in O.S....make sure you make reservations or we get what is available, and deal with it....until the next day and then go find something better suited for us...Happy traveling...the outlets were shorted out, the windows weren't secure in the frame,,,,,,and wouldn't close all the way...only one light bulb worked in the bedside lamps..but the bathroom was clean....and the sheets were clean. the morning staff was very nice as I gave them a list to things wrong...especially the electric problems..She seemed rather embarrassed..but was courteous. If you want a great room in Ocean Shores, make sure you make reservations or we get what is available, and deal with it....until the next day and then go find something better suited for us...Happy traveling...

Reviews.Title: “Drit like I have never seen before in a hotel”
Reviews.Author: JOK_8
Reviews.Content: The place was disgusting. The stuff was rude, when I asked for a clean sheets (when I came there they were dirty) the owner told me to "get out" . I have never seen such a thing. Is not enough to say it was "unproffesional" it was simply rude and their attitude was unacceptable. Do not go there, it's a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: “Hhahahah this place was a [--]JOKE”
Reviews.Author: wicikauskas
Reviews.Content: EWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW wow thats the first thing that comes to mind when i think back to last july. I stayed at this dump with a friend for 3 night.... first night a hooker knocked on my door asking for some guy gerry lol she was deff cracked out. the first floor was long term rentals for all the crack heads and hookers. the pool had no lights outside like the rest of the hotel so it made it more scary at night. there was always a gang of crack heads doing drugs in the parking lot. The owners were some russians that were beyond rude!!!!!!! they did have 1 guy who worked there he was nice..... he told us to remove everything from our car as daytona is not a nice area. OMG DAYTONA IS G_H_E_T_T_O!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Thank god i left my daughter at home if i didnt pre pay those 3 nights i would have been outta there quicker that you can say GO.The 3 nights we were in daytona there was 5 murders can you say scary! Dont get me wrong the majority of the ppl are harmless but the area is nasty the beach on the other hand was simply gorgeous. if i go again i would deff stay at a 5***** hotel. P.s. dont eat at the chinese buffet full of 60 year old hookers and scary bikers. P.p.s once your get out of daytona beach the area gets a bit nicer

Reviews.Title: “Don't waste your money!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: CaliforniaRacefan
Reviews.Content: If you want to pay over $200.00 per night (Daytona 500 weekend) for a smelly, run down, dirty motel with strange staff, this is your place! We bought our own sheets and pillows because theirs were stained/dirty with holes in them. The place was filthy beyond belief. The walls inside our room were obviously water damaged and it appeared as if the hurricane occurred inside the building. I heard and saw water running on to our private balcony and thought that it must be raining out side. To my surprise, It was beautiful and sunny outside, the water was running down the side of the building! Don't waste your money here. Otherwise, we had a great time in Florida, most folks there are extremely friendly!

Reviews.Title: “toilet bowl, dump, sewer, etc....”
Reviews.Author: funkingrv
Reviews.Content: This place is disgusting. The carpets haven't been cleaned in 20 years. Nothing worked properly. When we asked about getting a shower that worked the managment/owner was rude. We had drunks in the parking lot until 2:00 am and I called the front desk the owner said "if you want to stay in a funeral home you should have stayed there". WTF was that? Please don't stay there it is truly a dump. they have resident crackheads that rent the hotels on a weekly basis. Big mistake to go there never again!

Reviews.Title: “Very cozy, romantic place”
Reviews.Author: SanctaMaria
Reviews.Content: It was fabulous. Our vacation was wonderful. Staff provided all the utensils we needed for our Christmas meal. The carpet was nice and red and the beds were more than adequate. The whole hotel was a lively place with a great family atmosphere. The overnight clerk was great--when we couldn't sleep, we would just sit in the lobby and chat. We are definitely coming back next year--or sooner if our budget allows.

Reviews.Title: “Not first class but not so horrible”
Reviews.Author: teentraveler047
Reviews.Content: First of all i picked this hotel after getting down there, i didn't book it ahead of time so i don't know how good they are on reservations. It is definetly not the hilton but it isn't as horrible as evryone said. I got a oceanview room with i king size bed for 185$ for 4 nightsm that was a good deal compared to the other hotels. The oceanview was great. the carpet wasn't pristine but it wasn' t filthy. the comforter did have a small burn hole in it but it was on the top and it was tiny. The fridge was dirty on top but the inside was clean. The bathroom was clean and the hot water worked fine. They didn't include shampoo or anything but i had my own. Some members of the staff were rude but others were very nice. i had no problem getting my deposit back. they don't have a breakfast room or cafeteria anymore that has been turned into storage. Basically the hotel is a little run down but the pools are nice and the conditions are bearable. I don't reccomend it for families but it's great for teenagers or people wanting to party, or anyone who doesn't mind a little less nicer accomodations to save some money.

Reviews.Title: “run away”
Reviews.Author: drslawoman
Reviews.Content: What a nightmare! The sheets were slept on with burn holes in them. When we asked for clean sheets, we were told to take our money and go elsewhere. When we went to go get our refund and "go elsewhere" we were greeted by a very nasty woman who refused and insulted us. By far the worst hotel in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Horrible”
Reviews.Author: genxeno1
Reviews.Content: This hotel was absolutely horrible. The staff was rude, inconsiderate, and completely disrespectful. How they manage to own a hotel is beyond me...they truthfully deserved to be put out of business for being so rude. They acted like children to us and would not listen to any question we had. When we didn't understand why we were being yelled at (because before we even arrived they called yelling at us) they told us we were not like "normal person" hung up the phone, cancelled our reservations, and charged our credit card. Do not ever stay here!!! This is possibly the worst hotel I could've ever come across. Apparently ratings don't lie!

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel I ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: sm2004Kansas
Reviews.Content: Truthfully I don't know where to start. The hotel was far from what was shown on the website. The only good things about the place were, the sheets on the beds were clean and the ocean view was great. There were stains on the carpets, so bad my wife wouldn't walk on them without shoes. The kitchen area was gross and the fully equipped kitchen (no microwave) only had a couple of pots and pans, no utensils and there was something disgusting growing in one pot under the sink. Bugs (or something) had been smashed on the walls and never cleaned up. The fold out couch was a wreck (ripped, stained and uncomfortable). We tried to change our reservations on the day we arrived, but the manager would not work with us because we booked on line. The only ice machine was on the 8th floor and it was broken or out of ice. The second night (Friday) the noisey guests on our floor got unruley at about 3:00 am. At 4:30 we tried to call the desk and found that the phone didn't have a cord to the wall outlet. When I used my cell phone to call the desk, I had to leave a message. At 6:00 am we confronted the desk clerk and his solution was to give us a cord for the phone. No action what so ever was taken by the management to reslove the rowdy guests, infact we were told that we should have called the police (I assumed that was their responsibility). On Saturday morning both elevators were a mess, with one having pop spilled in it and the other having a booze bottle (750ml size that was full) broken on the floor, glass everywhere. Management was told at 6:00 and the mess was still there at 8:00. Upon checkout we complained to the manager, she told my wife that she was mentally handicapped and that she wasn't going to work with us on the complaint. She said that it was spring break and we should have gone to another hotel. She didn't give us a receipt when we checked out. SM - Kansas

Reviews.Title: “Great for Partying, Bad for Families”
Reviews.Author: aqt1018
Reviews.Content: Not as bad as everyone said, however it wasn't the Ritz Carlton either. A great place to party, being that it is already in pretty bad condiditon. Great view of the beach. The mangagement sucked! At about 2 am they called the police on all of us drunk people, but no one was doing anything wrong. And then when i went to check out (and try to get back my $200 deposit) they told me I owed then $10 for a missing patio chair, except there was ONLY ONE when i got there, and when I told that to the lady she said "Well, you didn't report it". (I was supposed to know there should've been 2 chairs? I guess so.) So make sure you check out the room and report any problems when you get there. If you're going to the beach for a family vacation of more than 1 or 2 nights, I would not recommend this place. The kitchenette area was gross and I wouldn't touch it. Also, it just wasn't the best atmosphere for families. But, if you're going to party and have fun, this hotel was GREAT for that!

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Say Here!!”
Reviews.Author: babiloniajoneser
Reviews.Content: This is absolutely the worst hotel stay my family and I have ever had. The first sign of disaster to come, should have been the front door to the hotel was broken. I tried to give the benefit of a doubt, but as we walked through the hotel the image just got much worse! The room was filthy. Mold in the shower, the sheets were dirty, the air condition looked and sounded like it was on it's last leg. Oh, and the squished roach on the wall when we walked in the room was the best part!!! I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “scary, urine smelling junkyard”
Reviews.Author: marmom
Reviews.Content: The motel was in a run down state. The room smelled of urine. The air conditioner on the balcony was leaking into a bucket that was overflowing. The pool water was dirty, and junk was stacked at the north side of the building. I was scared to stay there. Promptly left and went to a well established motel down the street. Will stay in well renowned motel chains from now on. Unfortunately , I lost 113.00$. A lesson well learned.

Reviews.Title: “Gross, Gross, Gross!!!”
Reviews.Content: Not recommended in the least. This hotel was the nastiest place I have ever stayed at in my entire life. Lets start with the parking lot, after we had already checked in we witnessed a drug deal as we were going up to our room. Then we got into the room and OH MY GOD the floors, the walls, the curtain, the couch, the beds and the bathroom was completely nasty. The couch that they put in the room had rips and burn holes in it. The comforters that they put on the beds also had rips and burn holes. We found an ash tray behind one of the beds that still had cigarettes in it from previous guest. The roof was falling down and not to mention the fact that mold was growing everywhere. The kichenette-um yeah-I wouldn't cook any thing on their stove or put anything in their rusted out refrigerator much less eat anything that was put there. We were only given two towels, one of which smelled like vomit, and one bar of soap and we booked the room has having 4 adults stay. The elevator didn't work properly and when you got on it with other guest not one of them had anything remotely decent to say about their stay. We actually witnessed one couple leave and check out because it was gross. The phone in the room didn't work at all we had to go down to the office to say anything to them. The alarm clock didn't work and neither did a couple of the lamps that were in the room. The TV and the A/C only worked when they wanted to. We were so hot and felt so nasty that we could not even sleep. One of the people we brought with us actually sleep on the couch cause they thought that it would be safer than the bed but they ended up with bites on their back from laying on the couch. I could go on and on and on about how nasty this room was and the people working there. I would not recommend anyone staying their much less just walking in it. Heed the warning. You get what you pay for!!!

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: mikesabode
Reviews.Content: When I arrived 30 minutes before the 3 PM check-in the room was not available. When it was available, the rug between the beds was wet, there were black stains in the bathtub/shower, there was no hot water to take a shower, the ice machine never worked, only one elevator worked, no clock radio, not complimentary tolietries (unless you count 1 bar of soap), the TV sometimes worked, the balcony light did not work, and it didn't look clean at all. Management answer: "we had some damage from the hurricanes last year". Well, if there was damage it should have been cleared up by now, or they shouldn't be renting out the rooms. I would never, never recommend this place to anyone every!

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experiences at the Ocean Sands Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We just returned after a beautiful week in Daytona Beach and the surrounding area. Unfortunately, our experiences at Ocean Sands Hotel leave a lot to be desired. Our choices were limited to due spring break and NCA/NDA activities. The rooms were of questionable cleanliness upon arrival. The maid service was very inconsistent. Some days we had clean towels but unmade beds. Other days, the beds were made but we had no clean towels. We were also treated badly by the management and told that we made too many complaints. Complaints were only in regard to towels, bedding, and a toilet that had never been cleaned. During the course of the week, the bedding had never been changed - the same rust stains could be identified all week. The information about the hotel said that all rooms were ocean view - not true. Also, the information said that there were in-room safes - also not true. The elevators worked occassionaly - not consistently. Management did not admit to being management until just prior to check-out. Management talked in a very condescending manner and continually changed excuses for maid service.

Reviews.Title: “It was not as bad as it sounds!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My friend and I took 11 teenage girls for Spring Break so we needed somewhere affordable and also not have to worry about destroying a room too badly. Well, we all had a great time and met some really great kids from all over. By the time the girls unpacked thier bags the floors and dressers were covered with all of their stuff we would have never noticed how bad it really was. We didn't actually cook in the rooms but the microwaves and refrigerators were clean and came in handy. I recommend rooms 702-703-704 it had a great view and was convenient to elevators and stairs if needed. 704 was actually best out of all rooms. I would not recommend taking a toddler or small child that would want to sit or crawl on the floor because it would not be clean enough for them. The pools were not bad and it definatly had enough chlorene in them to kill anything that would hurt you. Be sure to take your own towels they are very stingy about them and I have the feeling they don't have alot of them to give out. Also, bring your own sheets because it's a little sketchy, ours were clean but I can see where they might not have enough to really wash them everyday. We did not want maid service because they would have never been able to vacume from the mess of cloths everywhere. We had a great Spring Break and would stay here again next year. The cost of the room was definatly worth it... cheap which left lots of money for spending at the boardwalk etc.....

Reviews.Title: “Spring Break Fun !!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My Friend and I stayed here On our Spring Break March 24 and 25... We also Stayed here last year for Spring Break... We have really made some memories in this hotel.. The hotel is def. Not high class and never will be ... But if your lookin or a place to have fun and have money left over after gettin the room , you need to stay here ... Its not really a place for familys because there are lots of students that stay here and party hard!! Its hardly ever completely quiet because everyone is havin a good time!! See ya Next Year!! Spring Break 07'!! Ashlee and Sadie

Reviews.Title: “Consider This Your Warning!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for Valentine's day, And although the reviews weren't good it was the only available room in daytona beach. Hmmm, I guess we should have suspected something when we pulled up and it was the only empty parking lot in the entire county. The first room we looked at we couldn't get the sliding glass door to open or close, it was kinda stuck in the middle. So we switched rooms, after riding up in the eery elevator that expired in aug of 2005.. we settled into our rat shack! everything seemed to be OK, trying to make the best of the holiday, when about 11 we decided to use the "kitchenette" we paid $100 extra to have the convenience of not waiting in restaurants. Frying pan was on, steak was cooking... Then the firework show began... sparks flying out of the stove, ruined all the food.. no smoke alarm mind you.. the next morning we talk to the owner, and she says "we should charge you for the stove, you obviously dont know how to cook, and good thing the smoke alarm wasnt working because it would have woken up the other guests"

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The desk clerk was rude and the room was absolutely nasty. The carpet looked like it hadn't been cleaned or vacuumed in years, the fridge was supposed to be ivory colored, but it was more like rust and black from all the mildew and dirt. The view was good, but it was the dirtiest hotel I've ever stayed in.

Reviews.Title: “ok”
Reviews.Author: possemom
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very economical so I can't say too much. I was a little put aback when we got to the hotel after driving 15 hours to get there and the desk clerk says "go look at your 2 rooms first" I go to look at them , open one and I think "well it didn't cost much, so this is do-able" I go to look at the second room and a whole family is in there. I went and told the clerk and she said "well , I can give you two other rooms but you won't be near eachother, is that a problem?" Well, considering that we were there on vacation with our daughter who was home from Iraq on a 2 week R&R pass, yes that was going to be a problem. So, somehow they were able to find us adjoining rooms although I was a little concerned about whether they were going to send someone to our room to check it out like the poor family I walked in on. During our visit we had a heck of time getting more than 2 towels sent to our room and there was 3 people in each of our rooms. Don't forget your hairdryer cuz they don't have any and also make sure you have shampoo cuz you don't get that either. What you do get is a small bar of soap from some other hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, Dirty, Dirty”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Having just stayed at this place gave us the creeps. I stayed one night with two little girls and couldn't let them use either pool. Both were to dirty to use. We got up early sunday morning and left the area. Both girls were very tired this morning because of some loud tv on at three in the morning. Ours was usless, unless you were into purple people. Never again From Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Hoooorible!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in some nasty disgusting places before but this one beats them all. It actually ruined half of a road trip with 4 24 yr old guys (and you know we can stay in rat holes) the pools are inhabitable, the indoor pool has some sort of film on top that i imagine youd have to break through, not that i even thought of going in it. and i felt bad for the people i saw swimming in the outdoor pool so bad, SO BAD!

Reviews.Title: “nastiest hotel ever.....”
Reviews.Author: jess116000
Reviews.Content: THis hotel is the nastiest, most disgusting piece of crap hotel i have ever seen...much less stayed in! I was scared the entire building was going to fall down & collapse if one gush of wind blew through. The elevator permits expired in 2004, and only one elevator was in working condition. The indoor pool had human fescise in it!! I got very ill after i left the hotel, and i would not be suprised if i caught an illness from this dirty hotel. We found 3 LONG hairs on the pillow of our bed, and our friends bed had stains on it! Our ceiling even had a huge hole in it. The owner of the hotel, Eva, is very very very rude & HATEFUL! The only nice employee is the American guy that works the front counter. He was very polite & helpful. I hate that he even has to work at such a nasty place. This is the most disgusting place I have ever stepped foot in, and I everyone will take heed to my advice, and NOT stay @ the OCEAN SANDS! It is NASTY!! It needs to be pushed down & rebuilt!

Reviews.Title: “Toilet Bowl”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Rude staff. room was a shambles. Toilet did not flush and they refused to get a plumber to fix for 10 hours. I witnessed manager be very rude to several guests. They put a dead bolt lock on one of the fire exits each night (extremely illegal). This we reported to the fire marshall. They should just buldoze the place and start again.....

Reviews.Title: “not fit for a pig”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Lets just say there is NO WAY I would EVER stay there again, and would not advise anyone else to either!!! We should have realised it when we had to manually pry open the automatic doors to first get intoe the building and those never did get fixed in the 6 nights we were there, or that when we first opened the door to the room the belcony door was wide open, the toilet parer was empty, we only got maid service(if you would even call it that) 2 days out of the 6 we were there, we got things taken form our room and the staff said, too bad if it was not valued over $100 they would not do anything about it....the tub was disgusting, the toilet hadnt been cleaned in who knows how long, we had to get our own towles and toilet paper when we ran out, the pillows were as thick as a piece of paper, there was bird poop ALL OVER the belcony, beds had springs popping out of them the walls had holes in them, the facet broke and water was pouring out of it and when we called the staff to let them know they said the maintnence man went home for the night so WE needed to fix it. The staff was VERY unhelpful and VERY rude to say the least We were there over the Daytona 500 race week, so there was no where else for us to go otherwise we too would have been out of there!!!!! I am not someone who needs a fancy hotel trust me but this was not fit for an animal to stay in not only was it not clean and disgusting it was also very unsafe.

HotelInfo.Name: Ocean Sands Hotel
